      • mute

        public static void mute()
        Mutes all sound. The sound is still "playing" and will resume when the manager is un-muted

      • isPlaying

        public static boolean isPlaying(java.lang.String soundName)
        Checks to see if a specific sound is playing or not
        Parameters:
        soundName - The name of the sound checked
        Returns:
        Whether or not this sound is playing

      • unmute

        public static void unmute()
        Resumes all sound.
